reviews.review: был бы нормальный античит,128 тикрейт,обновление графики и правильное распределение званий,было бы неплохо
Cs:GO is a game of games
I hate this fucking game, yet i keep coming back.

In the following review i am going to talk about my personal opinion about the game.
CS:GO is a very entertaining game and has a nice game-play mechanics which not every shooter game has like for example the movement and shooting mechanic. I do also like the new stuff integrated like retake mode and new maps along with the new operation.
What i do definitely hate about the game is the anti-cheat system. 
It provides no help despite all the updates the developers made, because in every second and third game there is always a cheater involved in the game. 
I do hope that this matter will soon change.
